item.title: Jan 3, 2018 - microPlatform OpenCall meeting minutes
item.description: OSF is now 3 months old and the microPlatforms are reaching full speed. We are working on a few final work items before we move from limited beta to a public beta state for the Zephyr and Linux microPlatforms.
